-   Keyboard Shortcuts Part 1: Useful for any application (docs, email, code)
    -   **Mac:** Arrow keys + option, + command, + shift, & in combination
        -   option + arrow moves cursor to next word
        -   shift + option + arrow highlights next word
    -   **PC:** Arrow keys + Ctrl + Fn + shift, & in combination
        -   On keyboards made for Windows PCs, use the Alt key instead of Option, and the Ctrl key or Windows logo key instead of Command.
